thumb.name: A Little Love Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Valentine's Day.%3Cbr%3EMorgan!%3Cbr%3EIt's just me.%3Cbr%3ESandy...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...sending you%3Cbr%3Ea little love!

thumb.name: You'll Never Know Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFor My Dear.%3Cbr%3ESweet Valentine.%3Cbr%3EPaul%3Cbr%3EYou quiet my mind.%3Cbr%3Etickle my dreams.%3Cbr%3Eand show me%3Cbr%3Ewhat love is all about.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EYou'll never know%3Cbr%3Ehow deeply you've changed me %26#151;%3Cbr%3Ehow sweet it feels%3Cbr%3Ejust to hold your hand in mine.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Valentine's Day%3Cbr%3E
